Desc.eng: Mista Helsing, thank God you’re here! I saw something terrible in the tunnels. The Ink is coming!
What do you mean the Ink is coming?
A dark mist is flooding the tunnels, spitting forth all manner of horrors! They will soon be upon us! You must do something!
I’ll go and stop them at one of our outposts. (Play tower defense)
Tell the engineer to send some guards to man our outposts.
The creatures are getting close... I can feel it in my big toe!
I’ll go and deal with them immediately.
I must reinforce the defenses before I go out there.
